key.name: next-key
key.description: Reveals the ring and selects the next window on the current workspace.

key.name: next-button
key.description: Reveals the ring and selects the next window on the current workspace.

key.name: prev-key
key.description: Reveals the ring and selects the previous window on the current workspace.

key.name: prev-button
key.description: Reveals the ring and selects the previous window on the current workspace.

key.name: next-all-key
key.description: Reveals the ring and selects the next window, taking into account all workspaces.

key.name: next-all-button
key.description: Reveals the ring and selects the next window, taking into account all workspaces.

key.name: prev-all-key
key.description: Reveals the ring and selects the previous window, taking into account all workspaces.

key.name: prev-all-button
key.description: Reveals the ring and selects the previous window, taking into account all workspaces.

key.name: next-group-key
key.description: Reveals the ring and selects the next window of the currently focused application.

key.name: next-group-button
key.description: Reveals the ring and selects the next window of the currently focuse application.

key.name: prev-group-key
key.description: Reveals the ring and selects the previous window of the currently focused application.

key.name: prev-group-button
key.description: Reveals the ring and selects the previous window of the currently focused application.

key.name: window-match
key.description: Windows that should be shown in the ring. (match)

key.name: overlay-icon
key.description: Which type of icon overlay to draw on windows in the ring. (0 = None, 1 = Emblem, 2 = Big)

key.name: speed
key.description: The ring movement speed. (0.1 - 50.0)

key.name: timestep
key.description: Ring switcher timestep. (0.1 - 50.0)

key.name: inactive-opacity
key.description: Opacity (in percent) of unselected windows in the ring. (1 - 100)

key.name: darken-back
key.description: Darken background when showing the ring.

key.name: minimized
key.description: Show windows that are minimized, shaded or in show-desktop mode.

key.name: select-with-mouse
key.description: Allow the selection of windows by just clicking on them while the switcher is active.

key.name: ring-clockwise
key.description: Rotate the ring clockwise for the next window instead of counterclockwise.

key.name: ring-width
key.description: Ring width (in percent of the screen width). (1 - 100)

key.name: ring-height
key.description: Ring height (in percent of the screen height). (1 - 100)

key.name: thumb-width
key.description: Maximum horizontal size of a thumbnail in the ring. (10 - 1024)

key.name: thumb-height
key.description: Maximum vertical size of a thumbnail in the ring. (10 - 1024)

key.name: min-brightness
key.description: Changes the minimum brightness factor for windows in the ring. The further away windows are, the less bright they are. (0.1 - 1.0)

key.name: min-scale
key.description: Changes the minimum scale factor for windows in the ring. The further away the windows are, the smaller they are. (0.1 - 1.0)

key.name: window-title
key.description: Show the window title of the currently selected window.

key.name: title-font-bold
key.description: Render the window title using a bold font.

key.name: title-font-size
key.description: Font size of the window title text (in pixels). (6 - 96)

key.name: title-back-color
key.description: Color and opacity of the window title background.

key.name: title-font-color
key.description: Font color and opacity of the window title.

key.name: title-text-placement
key.description: Selects where to place the window title. (0 = Centered on screen, 1 = Top of screen minus offset, 2 = Bottom of screen plus offset)

key.name: vertical-offset
key.description: Vertical offset from top or bottom of the screen (in pixels). (0 - 500)
